entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
